parameters.text:
Analyze this Israeli tax Form 106 (טופס 106) and extract ALL available information in JSON format.

Required fields:
- tax_year: The tax year (string)
- employee_id: Employee ID number (תעודת זהות)
- employee_name: Full employee name
- employer_id: Employer ID/company number
- employer_name: Employer name
- total_income: Total gross income (הכנסה ברוטו)
- total_tax_paid: Total tax deducted (מס שנוכה)

Additional fields (extract if available):
- tax_credit_points: Number of tax credit points (נקודות זיכוי)
- monthly_income: Array of monthly income amounts
- national_insurance: National insurance payments (ביטוח לאומי)
- health_insurance: Health insurance payments (ביטוח בריאות)
- pension_employee: Employee pension contributions (פנסיה - עובד)
- pension_employer: Employer pension contributions (פנסיה - מעסיק)
- training_fund: Training fund contributions (קרן השתלמות)
- severance_fund: Severance fund (פיצויים)
- work_days: Number of work days
- work_months: Number of work months
- address: Employee address
- phone: Phone number

Return ONLY valid JSON. If a field is not found, use null. Do not add explanations.

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ { status: 'success', data: { tax_year: $json.extracted_data.tax_year, employee: { name: $json.extracted_data.employee_name, id: $json.extracted_data.employee_id, address: $json.extracted_data.address, phone: $json.extracted_data.phone }, employer: { name: $json.extracted_data.employer_name, id: $json.extracted_data.employer_id }, income: { total: $json.extracted_data.total_income, monthly: $json.extracted_data.monthly_income }, tax: { total_paid: $json.extracted_data.total_tax_paid, credit_points: $json.extracted_data.tax_credit_points }, deductions: { national_insurance: $json.extracted_data.national_insurance, health_insurance: $json.extracted_data.health_insurance, pension_employee: $json.extracted_data.pension_employee, pension_employer: $json.extracted_data.pension_employer, training_fund: $json.extracted_data.training_fund, severance_fund: $json.extracted_data.severance_fund }, work_period: { days: $json.extracted_data.work_days, months: $json.extracted_data.work_months } }, extracted_at: new Date().toISOString() } }}
